instruction: Identify the best action to take in the following scenario:
input: You are a manager at a retail store and notice a customer stealing an item.
output: The best action to take in this scenario is to confront the customer in a polite but firm manner. Ask them to return the item and explain why stealing is wrong. In most cases, the customer will be apologetic and put the item back, however if the customer does not return it it is best to contact the police.
